start.paragraph: This completes your secure access to this service.

no-cases-found.paragraph: There are no cases associated with this email. Please check you used the correct email, and access this service again via the IMA start page.

save-and-exit.paragraph1: To continue your form, use the link we have emailed to:

helper-details.paragraph: Answer all the following questions as if you are the person on the Illegal Migration Act notice.

immigration-adviser-details.paragraph: We will use these detail if we need to contact you.

medical-records.response-label1: You can change your mind at any time by emailing [EMAIL ADDRESS] to tell the Home Office they no longer have permission to access your medical records.

exception.header: Does an exception to the duty to remove apply to you?

removal-condition.header: Why does your Illegal Migration Act notice say removal condition 1 applies to you?

without-permission.header: Did you need permission to enter the UK but entered without it?

travel-ban.header: Did you arrive in or enter the UK, when a travel ban applied to you?
travel-ban.hint: This includes a travel ban imposed by the United Nations Security Council, or UK under the sanctions and Anti-Money Laundering Act 2018.

deception.header: Did you enter the UK with permission you got by deception?
deception.hint: For example, if you or someone else lied on your application.

entry-clearance.header: Did you need a valid entry clearance (visa) but arrived without one?

deportation-order.header: Did you enter the UK when a deportation order applied to you?

electronic-travel-authorisation.header: Did you need a valid electronic travel authorisation (ETA) but arrived without one?

deportation-order-applied.header: Did you enter the UK when a deportation order applied to you?

arrival-date.header: Did you arrive in the UK on or after 20 July 2023?

threatened-life-or-liberty.header: Did you come directly to the UK from a country where your life or liberty was threatened?

risk-of-harm.header: Would you be at risk of serious and irreversible harm in {{values.country-1}}?

harm-claim-countries.header: Which country can you make a serious and irreversible harm claim against?
harm-claim-countries.paragraph1: Check your Illegal Migration Act notice for the countries this applies to. You cannot make a claim against your country of nationality.
harm-claim-countries.paragraph2: You can add another country later

harm-claim-summary.header: Summary of your serious and irreversible harm claims

human-rights-claim.header: Are you making a human rights claim because you have family in the UK?

human-rights-family.header: Tell us about a family member in the UK

other-human-rights-claims.header: Do you want to make any other human rights claims?

exceptional-circumstances-claim.header: Are there any exceptional circumstances which mean you cannot currently be removed from the UK or to your home country?

exceptional-circumstances-details.header: What are the exceptional circumstances which mean you cannot currently be removed from the UK or to your home country?

temporary-permission.header: Why should you be granted temporary permission to stay in the UK?

temporary-permission-to-stay.header: Are there any other reasons you should be granted temporary permission to stay in the UK?

temporary-permission.header: Why should you be granted temporary permission to stay in the UK?

submitting-late.header: Are you submitting this form late?

submitting-late-details.header: Why are you submitting this form late?

confirm.submit-warning: You will not be able to change your answers after you submit.

human-rights-claim.label: Making a human rights claim because of family in the UK

does-exception-apply.label: Does an exception to the duty to remove apply to you?

temporary-permission-details-ban-only.label: Request for temporary permission to stay

immigration-adviser-declaration.paragraph1: What language was used to read the completed form to {{values.name}}?

helper-declaration.paragraph1: What language was used to read the completed form to {{values.name}}?

form-submitted.paragraph1: We have sent a copy of completed form to:
form-submitted.paragraph2: We will make decision about your claim, then contact you to tell you what you need to do next.
